create_modal.title: Choose title and project template
create_modal.description: Please fill in a title for your project and optionally choose a project template to begin  with. If you do not select a template, there will be no initial structure of the new project.

helperTexts.minLengthString: Title must contain at least %s characters

export_office_modal.title: Generate printable and editable document
export_office_modal.description: Please select a structure of your document. The option "Chapters" will list information units by chapter, "Tags" and "References" will sort information units by tags and references, respectively.

language_modal.title: Choose a language
language_modal.description: Select a language for the application.
